channel.title: Need Wasteland items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need Wasteland items"

item.title: Re: Need Wasteland items
item.content:encoded:
just wrote the pm to you and wanted to say that i write that late because i´m in a different timeline and because of that i can´t answer that fast ;)
also i hope the PM arrives (spelling mistakes are sometimes a problem)
the trade is done via PM, just to let you know that if the pm doesn´t arrive i still interested

thanks

item.title: Re: Need Wasteland items
item.content:encoded:
i can give you 3 crystal lenses. i want glowing goos at 6 for 1 (6 goos for 1 lens).

PM itachi92 in-game if you're interesed or for other offers if you don't want that one.

item.title: Need Wasteland items
item.content:encoded:
hy, just wanted to ask if someone is willing to trade crystal lens (i need 3), or instead of 1 lens 1 glassed sand, also i need a sharpening stone which can´t be traded, but as an ash-covered gem it´s possible.

if someone is interested please answer, i can give you all other wasteland crafting items you need (i don´t have any runes yet), if you need some other things just write it down i´m trying to get some

thanks in advance!
